elements.title: a building his grandfather designed
elements.contents: ... that architect Dirk Lohan paid $2,705 for the right to smash a window at a building his grandfather designed (pictured)?

elements.title: Bernardo Zapater
elements.contents: ... that Bernardo Zapater, a founding member of Spain's oldest private scientific society, is the namesake of a "totally underrated" flower?

elements.title: Sentachan Mine
elements.contents: ... that the Sentachan Mine was listed as the second-coldest mine in the world by Mining.com?

elements.title: Harmony Cobel
elements.contents: ... that Patricia Arquette researched cults and armies to prepare for her role as Harmony Cobel in the television series Severance?

elements.title: City Landscape
elements.contents: ... that Rockefeller University sold a version of Joan Mitchell's City Landscape for $17 million in 2024 to fund research?

elements.title: Guillermo Eleazar
elements.contents: ... that Filipino police chief Guillermo Eleazar rose to prominence after publicly shaming another officer?

elements.title: Argyle Street ash tree
elements.contents: ... that the urban environment around Glasgow's Argyle Street ash tree may have helped it to survive ash dieback disease?

elements.title: Cal Clemens
elements.contents: ... that Cal Clemens "tackled like a sledge hammer"?

elements.title: a restaurant
elements.contents: ... that a Japanese porn actor opened a restaurant that served poo-flavored curry?
